text: Marion Lepert (born September 18, 1995) is an American competitive sailor. She competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the women's RS:X. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:American sailors Category:Olympic sailors of the United States Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – RS:X Category:Pan American Games medalists in sailing Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for the United States Category:Sailors at the 2015 Pan American Games
title: Marion Lepert
